# My Page

## Load Libraries

`install.packages("tidyverse")`

`install.packages("palmerpenguins")`

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Plot

```{r}
#| labrl: fig-penguin
#| warning: false
#| fig-cap: "Penguin Plot"
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, color = species))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
```
